lead_paragraph: This veteran trio’s successful Kickstarter campaign, which will help pay for a new album, proves that the fund-raising site isn’t just for emerging acts.

headline.print_headline: Kickstarter Effort Lifts De La Soul
headline.main: De La Soul’s Kickstarter Campaign Raises $600,874

snippet: This veteran trio’s successful Kickstarter campaign, which will help pay for a new album, proves that the fund-raising site isn’t just for emerging acts.
abstract: Old-school hip-hop trio De La Soul uses Kickstarter to raise $600,874, more than $110,000 they hoped for, to bankroll production of their first album since 2004; while some career musicians find crowdfunding crass, Kickstarter's success at raising cash is driving more older established musical acts to use it to tap money for recording projects from their loyal fans.
